mapper.select: SELECT global_board_no AS boardId, user.user_id AS boardWriterId, user.user_name AS boardWriter, board_title, board_write_dt, board_edit_dt, board_deadline, board_notice, board_assignment, board_visible FROM board LEFT JOIN user ON user.global_user_no=board.board_user_no WHERE board_room_no=( SELECT global_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name=#{boardRoom} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_user_no, board_room_no, board_title, board_content, board_write_dt, board_edit_dt, board_deadline, board_notice, board_assignment ) VALUES(( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id=#{boardWriterId} ),( SELECT global_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name=#{boardRoom} ), #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriteDt}, #{boardEditDt}, #{boardDeadline}, #{boardNotice}, #{boardAssignment} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, board_deadline=#{boardDeadline}, board_assignment=#{boardAssignment}, board_notice=#{boardNotice}, board_edit_dt=#{boardEditDt} WHERE global_board_no=#{boardId}
